messages.subject: Being a merchant again...
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all - Listed some basic books on Ebay if anyone is interested. If I can get my energy up for more listings, I hope to put a few swords up on Ebay next week.
messages.messageBody:
Hi all -

Listed some basic books on Ebay if anyone is interested. If I can get my energy up for more listings, I hope to put a few swords up on Ebay next week. Will advise, if so.

http://tinyurl.com/344tp

Ron
STL
